text:
mindmatters | Hamburg, Germany | Flexible Hours, Onsite or Remote | http://mindmatters.de

mindmatters has supported startups and established companies with the agile development of digital products for over 15 years. We build web and mobile software for a wide variety of projects, from small prototypes and MVPs to big, robust and scalable applications.

To learn more about who we are, our engineering culture, and whether this is the right place for you, read our Key Values profile: https://www.keyvalues.com/mindmatters

Here are our open roles:

- Freelance Web Developer: http://bit.ly/2uPu21m

- Software Developer: http://bit.ly/2uPu21m

Tech Stack: mindmatters develops software for a variety of customers. Depending on the project specifics we choose mostly Java/Spring Boot, Ruby on Rails, JavaScript, React, Angular 2+, Swift, Objective-C, Android
